<kevaundray> Posting the link mentioned in the ACDE call: https://github.com/eth-act/planning/pull/1

We now have a discord channel for protocol related discussions in the eth r&d discord; so EL/CL/hardfork discussions will happen in that channel.

If you are not yet in the eth r&d discord, you can use this link to join: https://discord.gg/SSN5Z4qwza
